title: 1br/1ba @ The Residences of La Colombe d'Or
posting_body: ["This is a lease takeover in The Residences of La Colombe d'Or Distinctive & Reimagined Hotel and Apartment Homes Located in the heart of Montrose Houston.", 'Very walkable to grocery stores, restaurants, fitness studios, and bars.', 'Live in a beautiful dream.', 'One that has been created just for you.', 'One that is endless, luxurious, and artfully appointed.', "Presenting The Residences at La Colombe d'Or.", 'Taking deliberate inspiration from the South of France and boutique hotels, this elegant, high-rise living experience in downtown Houston is beyond compare.', "Here, you'll be immersed in fine art, timeless design, flawless service, and exclusive possibilities.", '1 bed1 bath apartment in one of the newest, exclusive, and elegant highrises in the city.', 'Gorgeous sunrise and downtown views from the 17th floor.', 'Good insulation between walls and floor, so the unit has been fairly quiet.', "I'm relocating for work that's the only reason I'm moving.", 'The experience here has been nothing short of incredible.', "The monthly rent(Self Prorated) is $2173 including the 1 month free that has been negotiated and some extra cash I'm throwing in.", 'If you move in sometime in August, the remainder of the month will be free as well (reducing the self-prorated rent listed above) as well as the full month of September.', 'The lease ends on 6/25/2023.', 'The Market Rent is $2415.', 'The amenity fee has been waived for this unit also, so only standard apartment fees apply(Water, trash, sewer, electric, etc. ).', 'The deposit has been paid, so the only fee to move is a $100 application fee per application.', ' All background and application screening will be done by the apartment management and information will be screened and verified per their policy.', 'More info.', 'about the community <URL>/', 'Tenet pays - Water, Sewer, Trash, Pest Control, Gas, Electric(has averaged well under $50) , Internet The application fee is $100 and all screening is done through the leasing office.']
